Chapter 8, Part 2: The Stars, from the Sun Treasury Section
At that time, the sage Åšucimukha said to the devas:

This sage Kharoá¹£á¹­hÄ« also created evil karma in the past. Because of the causes and conditions of his offenses, although he obtained a human body, half of it was shaped like a donkey. However, because of his compassionate power, his offenses were eradicated, and he attained the most excellent and upright body, just like Åšakra.
He told the nÄgas:
Because of my merits and causes and conditions, I am like that sage, serving as a guide for all the devas.
Now it is the same. I can teach you all profound and true words.
NÄgas, you should know!
After Kharoá¹£á¹­hÄ«'s body resembled Åšakra's, the assembly of devas and humans were all delighted. With single-minded palms joined, they said thus:
'Now the great sage has told us about the past. Which constellation moves in the front?'
What kind of food do they eat?
What kind of activities do they engage in?
How long do they travel through the sky?
Having asked this, the sage replied:

'All of you listen attentively and accept. By the power of kindness, I have regained my handsome appearance. Now, out of compassion, I will bring peace to beings and explain the beginning and end of the year, enabling you, who are like the blind, to gain sight.

From the first day of the lunar month to the full moon, I will fully explain the location of all the stars, in order to benefit all beings. Is it not so that I have placed the Pleiades star at the head of all the stars, you gods?'
All the gods said:
'Excellent, excellent!

We have passed through the stars and know that the Pleiades is the most revered and greatly powerful god's nephew. It has six sons that travel through the sky. Therefore, the Pleiades star should be at the head.'
The sage Kharoá¹£á¹­hÄ« said:

'When the moon joins the stars and ends in the Pleiades, the moon completes its course through the lunar mansions in one month. In the first dark fortnight of the eighth month, the moon joins the Pleiades. In this way, it revolves without cease.
I will now explain the number of ká¹£aá¹‡as. One thousand six hundred ká¹£aá¹‡as are called one kalÄ. Sixty kalÄs are called a muhÅ«rta. Thirty muhÅ«rtas are one day and night.

'The lunar mansion Pleiades, even if evil and unrestrained like Åšakra, can protect the four directions and bring them peace and security. You heavenly beings, do not find fault with their evil deeds. Strictly enforce the laws to protect sentient beings.'
All the heavenly beings said:
'It is so, it is so, as the sage teaches.
Strictly enforcing the laws will save sentient beings.'

If the moon is in conjunction with Wei, on that day the sick may be either light or heavy, difficult to treat. Those born on that day have a nature of much anger, are fierce, violent, and difficult to be close to, have a high official position and can overcome sentient beings.
On the days of the four lunar mansions of Kang, Xu, Zhang, and Wei, one should not enter battle, fight, travel far, shave, or groom the hair.
On the days of the three lunar mansions of Bi, Niu, and Zhen, it is suitable for battle, far travel, shaving, and washing the head.
On the days of the lunar mansions of Liu and Zhang, one may accomplish all matters.
On the days of the three lunar mansions of Mao, Wing, and Dou, seeking wealth can be obtained, it is suitable to take medicine, observe precepts and give alms, make new clothes, and create necklaces.
On the days of the four lunar mansions of Zui, Jiao, Nu, and Qi Xing, it is suitable for travel and the road is safe.
The three constellations of DÄ«, JÄ«va, and Tiá¹£ya are suitable for creating evil.
The six constellations of Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, Puá¹£ya, CitrÄ, SvÄti, SÄvará¹‡i, and MÅ«la are suitable for making carts, beds, rope beds, and various garments, and for forming friendships.

The Pleiades quickly create various karmas, as fast as fire. If one falls ill on that day, offering curds and rice as a sacrifice for four days will cure it. One born on that day will always be very wealthy. On that day, one enters the womb.
The five constellations of Ä€rdrÄ, Punarvasu, ViÅ›ÄkhÄ, Puá¹£ya, and Åšravaá¹‡a are not suitable for undertaking any activities on those days, but one may fight a great battle.
The three constellations of Jyeá¹£á¹­hÄ, MÅ«la, and AnurÄdhÄ are suitable for both good and evil deeds on those days.
The constellation of Má¹›gaÅ›iras is also suitable for independence.

The three constellations of Jingdi, Di, and Wei - on these three constellation days, if one born under the Pleiades does not engage in activities, travel far, or fight, even if there is an urgent matter, one should not do it.

The three constellations of NÃ¼, Jiao, and Zui are also the worst. On the days of the Wing constellation, if one fights with an enemy, one will win, either being tough or gentle, and will still achieve reconciliation.

The two constellations of Zhen and Niu - on these two constellation days, if one seeks a companion, one will not find one. If one takes medicine, formulates medicine, goes forth, gives, makes new clothes, necklaces, beds, bedding, and other items, one will all achieve success.
The three constellations of Zhang, Xu, and Kang - on these three constellation days, one's travels will be safe and secure.

The three constellations of Gui, Wei, and Shi - on these three constellation days, if one creates evil together with others, departs from a compassionate mind, and does various things, one will succeed.

The seven stars, the heart asterism, the room asterism, the willow asterism, and the beak asterism - on these five asterism days, it is suitable for marriage, for making carriages and beds, and for theå‚ asterism day, undertakings are also auspicious, but one should give rise to compassion for all.

The æ¯• asterism is of the water nature. On the second asterism day, create soft and harmonious matters, all will be united. If one is sick on that day, offer incense to the fire and recover after five days. If one is born on that day, that person will be very wealthy, have blessings and virtues, and enjoy the Dharma.
Theç‰› asterism, theå¥ asterism, theä¸ƒæ˜Ÿ asterism, and the heart asterism - if one conceives on these days, that person will have little virtue and always do inferior things.

Theé¬¼, å°¾, and å®¤ asterisms - on these three asterism days, one should not do any work, should not fight, should not travel far, should not go to court, and should not engage in buying and selling, crafts, or work.
If one performs good deeds on the days of the asterisms Kang and Xu, one will not achieve harmony, but will be suitable for battle and victory.
On the day of the asterism Zhen, one will benefit from affairs, and it is beneficial to do soft things without obstacles.
On the days of the asterisms Zui, Jiao, and Nu, many things are harmonious, and what one undertakes is accomplished. Taking medicine is effective.
If one wishes to give charity, or to make clothes and adornments, one can do all of them.
On the days of the asterisms Jing, Di, and Wei, traveling far is safe.
On the days of the asterisms Fang, Liu, and Pi, if one wishes to leave compassion and do evil, one can succeed.
On the days of the six asterisms Dou, Ji, Lou, Wei, Shi, and Yi, one should form close friendships, marry, and make acquaintances. One can make beds, bedding, and carriages.

The Ká¹›ttikÄ lunar mansion governs for four days. In this world, if one engages in various activities, they will quickly succeed. If one is sick on this day, offering bean gruel to the moon on the eighth day will cure it.
If one is born on this day, they will be vigorous, greatly wealthy, and prosperous. If a woman sees various bad things, she should protect herself. I say this is not false.
If a person born under the Ká¹›ttikÄ lunar mansion enters the womb on the lunar mansions of AÅ›vinÄ«, MÅ«lÄ, DÄ«rgha, or Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, it is bad and inauspicious.
On the days of the lunar mansions of Ä€rdrÄ, UttarÄ, and Åšravaá¹‡Ä, one should not engage in battle, travel far, or go to government offices. If one has to go, one should stop and not leave.

On the days of the lunar mansions of AÅ›vinÄ«, Bharaá¹‡Ä«, and ViÅ›ÄkhÄ, if one creates various evils and is not harmonious, speaks falsely and flatteringly, and wishes to kill enemies, one will succeed.

On the day of the lunar mansion of Rohiá¹‡Ä«, if one wishes to do things, both firmness and gentleness are acceptable. On the day of the lunar mansion of Má¹›gaÅ›irÄ, if one does things for the benefit of others, one will be able to attain independence.

The stars Kang and Xu are not in harmony with each other. On the day of the star An, one can obtain benefits. On that day, if one takes medicine, goes forth, gives donations, makes necklaces and clothes, all can be done.
On the days of the stars Gui, Wei, and Shi, one can travel far with peace and safety.
On the days of the stars Xin, Kui, and Qi, if one wishes to do evil, evil deeds can be accomplished.

On the days of the stars Zhen, Wei, Pi, Niu, and Ji, it is suitable to form close friendships, make good acquaintances, get married, and do auspicious things. One can also build carriages, beds, and furniture.

The star An rules for five days and can accomplish all evils. If one wishes to do work, there will be little benefit. If one falls ill on that day, one should offer porridge with fresh butter to the four paths. One will recover in ten days.

If one is born on that day, although one is intelligent by nature, one harbors evil in one's heart. One seeks wealth and possessions until death. It also rules over becoming a thief and losing one's life.

Those born or conceived on days of theè™›å®¿, å¿ƒå®¿, å¥å®¿, ç¿¼å®¿, æ–—å®¿, èƒƒå®¿, these six constellations, have many obstacles, and even on days of é¬¼å°¾å®¤å®¿ and so forth, they are not harmonious, and all matters cannot be done.
On days of theäº¢å®¿, if one wishes to create something, one should do light work.
On days of theæ°å®¿, å±å®¿, äº•å®¿, å¥å®¿, these four constellations, one can be self-sufficient.
On the six days of the äº•å®¿, the evil karma is divided and decided. If one falls ill on that day, offer fried rice grains to the sun god. One will recover on the eighth day.

Those born or conceived on that day are suitable for farming and will become very wealthy, and will have many livestock such as elephants, horses, and sheep. On the day of the è¾Ÿå®¿, a hundred things are unsuitable.
On the two days of the æŸ³å®¿ and æˆ¿å®¿, creating a hundred things will result in much loss and dispersal.
On the day of the asterism Di, it is suitable to do many things, as one wishes, with ease.
On the days of the asterisms Gui, Zhang, Wei, and so forth, it is suitable to undertake a hundred things and obtain what one seeks.
On the days of the asterisms Xin, Xing, Kui, and so forth, it is suitable to set out on a long journey, as the road will be safe and one will harmonize with those one encounters.
On the days of the asterisms Dou, Yi, Kui, and so forth, it is suitable to make friends and seek good spiritual advisors.
On the days of the four asterisms Kang, Pi, Zui, and Xu, they will create obstacles for those born in the well.

The asterism Gui governs for seven days and can be gentle and not destroy good dharmas. If one falls ill on that day, using yellow stone honey to make offerings to the planet Jupiter for five days will cure it.

Those born on that day will uphold the precepts and enjoy good deeds. They will obtain high official positions as national teachers and chief ministers, and will always teach the king good dharmas to govern the world. As for taking a wife, it is especially difficult to harmonize, and only after earnestly relying on others can it be accomplished.
If a person born on that day wishes to conceive on a room star, ghost star, wing star, lou star, or dipper star day, it is auspicious.
The three stars of bi, jia, and nÃ¼ are obstacles.
On the days of the seven stars, heart star, and qu star, undertakings will not be accomplished and one will lose wealth.
On the day of the wei star, undertakings will be accomplished, and on the day of the fang star there will also be much benefit.
The two stars of bi and liu are not suitable for activities.
On the day of the zhang star, traveling far will be safe.
The lou and ji stars are obstacles.
On the days of the three stars of chen, niu, and mao, undertakings will be harmonious and one will surely find good companions.
The stars of keng, zui, zhen, and xu are suitable for making friends and good acquaintances.
On the days of the two stars of keng and wei, what is sought will be obtained and there will be benefits.
The asterism Ru-na has eight days of influence. All evil deeds can be done. In the world, it is like Yama. On that day, the sick cannot be cured.
Those born on that day are often angry and have no compassion. They often commit offenses and are disliked by others. They can destroy good dharmas and always like hunting.
The asterisms Pi-na and Go-na, on these two asterism days, conception is auspicious.
The asterisms Zhen-na and Mao-na, conception on these days is inauspicious.
The asterisms Wei-na, Xu-na, Kang-na, and Zhang-na, on these four asterism days, it is not suitable to do things, as there will be much loss and scattering.
The asterism days of Ji-na, Lou-na, and Fang-na, on these days, it is suitable to do many things and achieve good results.
On the asterism day of Xin-na, the seven stars, and the asterism day of Wei-na, traveling far will be safe.
On the asterism days of Yi-na, Dou-na, and Nu-na, it is suitable to study and accomplish skills.
The five constellations of Jiao, Dou, Wei, Wei, and Pi are suitable for making friends.
The four constellations of Di, Zhang, Jing, and Shi are also suitable for making friends.

The seven stars and nine days are in charge, being warm and gentle to all beings. If one is sick on that day, one should offer glutinous rice mixed with sesame oil to one's ancestors. On the eighth day, one will recover.

Those born on that day are intelligent and have blessings and virtues, always doing good things. However, that person's nature slightly likes to speak falsely. If one protects one's body, one should be careful not to speak falsely. That person's affairs are beneficial.
The three constellations of Heart, Gui, and Di are not suitable for conception, as the fetus will be poor and have few possessions.
The constellations of Zhang, Wei, and Pi are not suitable for conception, as the fetus will be inauspicious and always do evil things.
The two constellations of Jiao and NÃ¼ are also not suitable for conception, as the fetus will be poor and like to do evil things.
If one receives the womb on the days of the three constellations Wing, Stomach, and Dipper, one will be self-sufficient in doing things and obtain other people's things.
On the days of the constellations Lou, Zhang, and Ji, if one wishes to do things, there will be many obstacles.
On the days of the four constellations Chen, Niu, Mao, and Di, going and coming will be safe and things will be harmonious.
On the days of the two constellations Xu and Zi, there will be obstacles.

On the tenth day of the Zhang constellation, soft and gentle things are used to bring peace to the world. If one is sick on that day, one should offer the fruit of the pomegranate and fresh ghee to the deity. In seven days, one will recover.
Those born on that day are fond of fragrant clothes and necklaces, crave sexual activities, and enjoy drinking. If they are in a crowd, they must be careful.
On the days of the two constellations Lou and Jing, receiving the womb is the worst.
On the days of the three constellations Xu, Kang, and Zi, receiving the womb is also bad and is not suitable for doing things.
The three constellations of AnurÄdhÄ, Má¹›gaÅ›irÄ, and Vá¹›á¹£a also have many obstacles on these days.
On the day of the lunar mansion PÅ«rvÄá¹£Äá¸hÄ, one gains freedom.
On the days of the two lunar mansions Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä and Ká¹›ttikÄ, those who seek something will not get what they wish for.
On the day of the lunar mansion Bharaá¹‡Ä«, those who conceive a child will be able to remove obstacles.
On the days of the four lunar mansions UttarÄá¹£Äá¸hÄ, Åšravaá¹‡a, Åšatabhiá¹£Ä, and RevatÄ«, traveling far will be safe and secure.
On the days of the six lunar mansions MÅ«la, Åšravaá¹‡a, AÅ›vinÄ«, CitrÄ, SvÄti, and ViÅ›ÄkhÄ, if one wishes to form friendships, obstacles will prevent success.

On the eleventh day of the lunar mansion UttarÄá¹£Äá¸hÄ, the two kinds of karma are carried out in the four continents, namely flattery and gentle deeds. If one falls ill on this day, cook black beans and use them to make offerings to the deity. In ten days, one will recover;

Those born on this day are suitable for various [endeavors], but their nature is foolish, stingy, and miserly, unable to give joyfully. They can also fast for five, six, up to seven days, and are not loved by worldly people. They must be very careful to guard against enemies and should not engage in disputes.
Those who enter the womb on the Wei lunar mansion day often create various evils.
The Wei, Zhang, Di, and Fang lunar mansions - on these four days, both good and evil deeds can be done.
On the Fang lunar mansion day, there is neither good nor evil.

The Pi and Gui lunar mansions - those who conceive on these two days will lose wealth.ğŸ”½The Wei, Lou, and Dou lunar mansions - those who conceive on these three days, and the Zhen, Niu, and Mao lunar mansions, on these three days, deeds are done in harmony.
If deeds are done on the Xu, Zi, and Kang lunar mansions, they will be accomplished, and one will obtain the power of the three lunar mansions, traveling far with ease.
The three constellations of Jing, Shi, and Wei have neither good nor evil on these days.
The constellations Lou, Qi, Kui, Liu, and Xin are suitable for making good friends, getting married, and other matters, all of which can lead to harmony.

The twelfth day is under the governance of the Zhen constellation. It is evil and self-willed, swift as the wind. If one falls ill on this day, one should offer curds to the deity and one will recover in five days.

Those born on this day will be very wealthy and have abundant wealth. They can use the five weapons such as swords, spears, bows, arrows, fighting wheels, and slings. They can become great thieves and kill many beings.

If they cultivate goodness, they can also uphold the precepts, joyfully give, and practice generosity. They can accomplish various kinds of merit. Wherever this person goes, snakes dare not approach within seven steps.
If one enters the womb on this day, they will become the leader among thieves, and will also be able to uphold the precepts, joyfully give, and practice generosity.
Those conceived on the day of the Puá¹£ya lunar mansion will have no obstacles wherever they are, and will be able to defeat their enemies if they enter the battlefield.
The two lunar mansions of the Sui and the Bi, on these two days, those conceived will have things to do from birth to death.
The three lunar mansions of the Niu, the Xing, and the Xu, on these three days, those conceived will have nothing to do except for the Niu lunar mansion.
The other three lunar mansions of the Xing, the Nu, and the Zi, on these four days, doing things will bring benefits and gain independence.
The three lunar mansions of the Xing, the Pi, and the Wei, on these three days, traveling far will be safe.

The four lunar mansions of the Di, the Zhang, the Fang, and the Pi, on these four days, doing various things will bring human energy and strength, and it is also suitable for taking a wife, forming close friendships, and making good acquaintances.
The six lunar mansions of the Ji, the Qi, the Lou, the Dou, the Zhang, and the Wei, on these six days, doing things will bring the above benefits.
The Ká¹›ttikÄ lunar mansion governs for thirteen days. If one does evil, it is swift.

If one falls ill on this day, remove the outer skin of green beans, pound them to make an offering to the deity for six days, and the illness will be cured. If one is born on this day, one will be good at joking, music, singing and dancing, and will also be able to give generously.
Moreover, one will have much desire and also enjoy those with knowledge. If a person enters the womb on this day, it is suitable for the Pleiades.
If a person enters the womb on the days of the lunar mansions Puá¹£ya, Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, or Má¹›gaÅ›irÄ, they will often do evil things.
If a person does things on the days of the lunar mansions MaghÄ, UttarÄá¹£Äá¸hÄ, or Jyeá¹£á¹­hÄ, various things will be auspicious and there will be no obstacles.
If one undertakes activities on the days of the lunar mansions AÅ›vinÄ«, Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, or MÅ«la, one will also attain freedom.
On the days of the four lunar mansions of AÅ›vinÄ«, Bharaá¹‡Ä«, SvÄtÄ«, or RevatÄ«, traveling far will be safe.
On the days of the lunar mansions AÅ›vinÄ« or Má¹›gaÅ›irÄ, those who undertake projects will obtain the power of knowledge.
The seven constellations of Heart, Kui, Dipper, Pleiades, Wing, Ox, and Tent are suitable for forming close friendships, marriages, and other such matters.

The fourteenth day of the Kang constellation is in charge. It can create all kinds of evil karma in the world. Its nature is swift and its actions are sharp. If one falls ill on this day, it is extremely evil and difficult to cure. Offer flowers and honey to the deity, and one can recover on the twenty-fifth day.

Those born on this day are good at calculation and are very wealthy. Their nature is stingy and greedy, and they cannot give with joy. They also have a lot of anger and their minds are difficult to understand.
If they see a special ox or one with a yellow waist, they must protect themselves.
If such a person enters the womb on the days of the two constellations of Mouth and Winnowing Basket, it will be evil and unwholesome.
The four constellations of Tent, Stomach, Willow, and Heart are neither good nor evil if one wishes to do things on these days.
If one wishes to do things on the days of the lunar mansions of Pleiades, Tail, or Dipper, there will be many obstacles.
If one has plans on the days of the three lunar mansions of Asterism, Base, or Rooftop, one will obtain the help of others.
If one travels far on the days of the three lunar mansions of Mound, Winnowing Basket, or Seven Stars, one will be safe and sound.
If one wishes to form close friendships or marry on the days of the three lunar mansions of Room, Ghost, or Wall, it is suitable.
On the days of the seven lunar mansions of Chariot, Woman, Rooftop, Rooftop, Ox, Wing, or Neck, one should only travel and not do anything else.

The lunar mansion Base governs for fifteen days. It can create all kinds of evil that people fear and respect. If one falls ill on this day, offer flowers to the deity. After fifteen days, one will recover.

If one is born on this day, one will have majestic virtue, be very wealthy, and have abundant wealth. One's nature will be stingy and greedy, and one will lust after other people's wives. One must restrain oneself and not engage in such matters.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
If the person enters the womb under the asterism of Pleiades, it is suitable for undertaking various activities under the asterism of Well.
If it is the day of the asterisms of Seven Stars, Louse, or Ox, the undertaking will be accomplished without good or evil.
If it is the day of the asterisms of Pleiades, Ox, or Wing, the undertaking will be mostly bad with many obstacles.
The three days of the asterisms of House, Room, and Tail will bring benefits.
On the day of the asterism of Room, traveling far will be safe.
For the three asterisms of Heart, Turtle, and Willow, if one wishes to undertake something, one will get the help of others.
For the three asterisms of Wall, Dipper, and Stomach, on these three days it is suitable to make close friends and get married.

The Pleiades govern the first day of the bright fortnight, able to accomplish swift matters in the world. On that day, those who are ill should make green bean rice to offer to the deity, and within ten days they will recover. Those born on that day have the misfortune of falling off cliffs or being injured by weapons. For these two matters, they must protect themselves and are suitable for the occupation of trading. They are soft, elegant, enjoy the Dharma, and believe in blessings.
If a person enters the womb, it is suitable on the day of the well constellation.
On the days of the asterisms of the Pleiades, Dipper, and Stomach, if one wishes to do various things, there will be neither good nor evil.
The three asterisms of the Heart, Willow, and Kui are inauspicious for doing things on these days.
The three asterisms of the Heart, Willow, and Kui are auspicious for doing things on these days.
The four asterisms of the House, Room, Ghost, and Wing are peaceful for doing things on these days and one will attain freedom.
The two asterisms of the Winnowing Basket and the Necklace are peaceful for long journeys on these days and one will gain the power of friends.
The asterisms Puá¹£ya, Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, MaghÄ, and MÅ«la are favorable for undertaking activities and obtaining other people's things.

The asterisms Ä€rdrÄ, Punarvasu, AÅ›vinÄ«, Puá¹£ya, AÅ›leá¹£Ä, and Má¹›gaÅ›iras, on these six asterisms one should form close friendships, make small and large acquaintances, and marry, all of which are auspicious.

The second day of the asterism CitrÄ is good for doing evil things. If one falls ill on this day, one should offer rice gruel, barley rice, and yellow rock candy to Indra. After thirteen days, one will recover.
Those born on this day are by nature very angry and have no compassion. Even if they observe the precepts, they will also break them.
If they see others practicing pure conduct, they should be careful in this place. The place of birth should also be protected. Entering the womb on this CitrÄ day is auspicious.
The asterisms AÅ›vinÄ«, Puá¹£ya, and Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, on these three asterisms entering the womb is inauspicious.
The asterisms AÅ›vinÄ«, Bharaá¹‡Ä«, and Má¹›gaÅ›iras, on these three asterisms it is suitable to do various things.
If one performs activities on the Pleiades day, there will be many obstacles.
The three stars of the Seven Stars, the Dipper, and the Lou constellation, on these three star days one gains freedom and has many benefits.
The six stars of the Pu, Liu, Kui, Wei, Zhen, and Pi constellations, on these six star days one obtains the power of others.
The three stars of the Wei, Zhang, and Dou constellations, on these three star days one should go on a long journey, and the road will be safe and secure.
The six stars of the Shi, Kang, Wei, Jing, Di, and Zhang constellations, on these six star days one should form close friendships and take a wife.

The Pu constellation rules for three days, and one can do both hard and soft things. If one falls ill on this day, one should take fruit roots and fruit flowers and use them to make offerings to the gods for thirty days to be cured.

Those born on this day will be greatly wealthy, with abundant wealth and grain. Such a person has the marks of a person with spiritual virtues, but only in the place of birth must one be on guard, and one will also be prone to being trampled by wild mares. When going to the place of wild mares, one must also be prepared.
For those who enter the womb on the day of the Puá¹£ya lunar mansion, the Willow, Horn, Heart, and Orion lunar mansions, on these four lunar mansion days it is suitable to do evil things.
The Chitra, House, Pleiades, and Kui lunar mansions, on these four lunar mansion days one should not engage in various kinds of activities.
On the Heart lunar mansion day, evil things can be done.

The Dipper, Wing, and Stomach lunar mansions, on these three lunar mansion days if one wishes to do evil things, there will be no benefit but much vexation.ğŸ”½The Winnowing Basket, Seven Stars, and Rooftop lunar mansions, on these three lunar mansion days one will attain freedom and have benefits.
The Horn, Void, and Mouth lunar mansions, on these three lunar mansion days one will obtain the power of others and attain freedom.
The three constellations of AnurÄdhÄ, Jyeá¹£á¹­hÄ, and MÅ«la are days for travel that are safe.

The six constellations of Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, MaghÄ, PÅ«rvÄá¹£Äá¸hÄ, PÅ«rvaproá¹£á¹­hapadÄ«, PÅ«rvabhÄdrapadÄ, and AÅ›vinÄ« are suitable for forming acquaintances, with close friends and relatives, and for marriage and betrothal, all of which are auspicious.

On the fourth day of the influence of the Ká¹›ttikÄ lunar mansion, if one falls ill, one should offer sesame gruel and niá¹£kÅ«á¹­ha seeds to the water spirit. On the eighth day (the original text of the Tang dynasty says day), one will recover.

People born on this day are good at farming and boating. They are diligent by nature and practice the ten wholesome deeds. They are knowledgeable and wise, have great fame and wealth, and always follow wise people.ğŸ”½On the days of the lunar mansions of AÅ›vinÄ« and Má¹›gaÅ›Ä«rá¹£a, one should engage in various activities.
The three lunar mansions of AÅ›vinÄ«, AÅ›lesÄ, and Åšravaá¹‡a are days for undertaking various tasks, neither good nor bad.
The two lunar mansions of Bharaá¹‡Ä« and Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä are inauspicious for activities on these days.
On the day of the Jing constellation, those who engage in business will lose their old occupation.

On the days of the Yi, Mao, and Niu constellations, those who wish to do things can have benefits as they wish.ğŸ”½On the days of the Zhang, Wei, and Dou constellations, those who undertake work can get the help of others and also have benefits.
On the days of the Can, Kang, and Wei constellations, those who wish to do things can also get the help of others.
On the days of the Zhen, Pi, and NÃ¼ constellations, if you wish to travel far, the road will be safe.
The five constellations of Kui, Gui, Liu, Fang, and Pi are suitable for forming close friendships and marrying on these days.
The Dou constellation governs for five days, and soft and gentle work is done.
If one falls ill on that day, fry rice grains and mix them with honey to offer to the spirits. In seven days, one will recover.
Those born on this day are wise people, with few illnesses, great wealth, and many acquaintances. It is suitable for that person to enter the womb in the Zhang lunar mansion.
If it is in the Wei, Can, or Kang lunar mansions, it is neither good nor evil, and if one wishes to do many things, they will all be accomplished.
The four lunar mansions of Bi, Fang, Gui, and Wei are not auspicious for doing things on these days.
The three lunar mansions of Bi, NÃ¼, and Zhen wish to seek independence on these days, but there are many obstacles.
The lunar mansions of Mao, Niu, and Yi and so forth are suitable for doing things on these days, and one will be independent and as one wishes.
The lunar mansions of Di, Jing, and Shi and so forth are also suitable for doing things on these days, and one will have the power of blessings.
The lunar mansions of Jiao, Zui, and Xu and so forth are suitable for long journeys on these days, and one will be safe on the road.
The six lunar mansions of Kui, Liu, Fang, Lou, Qi Xing, and Xin are suitable for forming close friendships and getting married on these days.

The Ox lunar station has six days of influence. Those born on this day are by nature resolute and fearless, fierce and strong, superior to others, able to conquer lands, and have no strong enemies ahead of them, with great wealth and abundance.
If one enters the womb, it is suitable to be in the Wing lunar station, and all the stars will not create obstacles, all becoming good friends.
The Female lunar station has seven days of influence. Those who fall ill on this day will experience it for twelve months. Molasses and flowers offered to the mountain god will then be cured.

Those born on this day will encounter companions on a long journey, and it is suitable to engage in business and do gentle things. That person has wisdom and few illnesses, and will always receive offerings from the king of the world.
Those who enter the womb on the Chariot lunar station day will be neutral, neither good nor bad.
The Ghost lunar station and the Room lunar station, these two lunar station days create obstacles.
The Seven Stars lunar station, the Heart lunar station, the Female lunar station, and the Pleiades lunar station, these four lunar station days are suitable for doing various things.
On the days of the constellations Kang, Wei, and Zhang, undertakings are not suitable.
On the days of the constellations Xu and Zi, one can achieve harmony, accord with one's wishes, and be self-sufficient.
On the days of the constellations Shi, Jing, and Di, long journeys will be safe and one will also be self-sufficient.
On the days of the constellations Kui, Fang, and Liu, those who wish to undertake projects will obtain the strength of others and also encounter good friends.
On the days of the constellations Mao, Zhang, and Yi, it is suitable to form close friendships.

On the eighth day when the constellation Xu is in charge, if one falls ill on that day, one will recover in a year. One should make four kinds of gruel with mung beans, crow beans, small beans, and river beans, and offer fragrant flowers to the deity.
One born on that day has a nature of much anger and greed, is poor and lacks clothing and food, is also lacking in sexual desires, relies on close relatives, and is always in great fear.
If one conceives on the day of the constellation Ju, it is auspicious.
If one receives a fetus on the days of the asterisms Zhang, Wei, or Ji, it will be evil and have many obstacles.
If one enters a fetus on the days of the asterisms Fang, Liu, or Kui, it will be neutral, neither good nor evil.
If one receives a fetus on the days of the asterisms Di, Jing, or Shi, it will also be evil, dispersing and not combining.
The three asterisms Kang, Wei, and Sam are days for doing things that benefit and can bring harmony.
On the day of the asterism Zui, if one wishes to do something, one can do everything.
The three days of the asterisms Gui, Wei, and Pi are suitable for long journeys, with a safe road.
On the days of the asterisms Lou, Qi, and Xin, if one does something, one will get good friends and good companions.
On the days of the asterisms Yi, Ji, and Mao, one should also make close friends and so forth.
On the days of the two asterisms Pi and Niu, one should also make great good friends.
The Pleiades govern for nine days. The nature is soft and tender. If one falls ill on this day, one will recover by offering milk, curds, and porridge to the water deity for seven days.
Those born on this day have a violent and fierce nature, but are brave and courageous, and have the danger of water. If they go near water, they must be careful and cautious.
Entering the womb on the day of the Pleiades is auspicious.
On the days of the lunar mansions Lu, Qi, Xin, and so forth, if one undertakes activities, it will be neutral, neither good nor bad.
On the days of the lunar mansions Dou, Mao, and Wing, if one undertakes activities, it will be bad.
On the days of the lunar mansions Bi, Gui, Wei, and Zhang, if one undertakes activities, it will also be bad and not go as wished.
On the days of the lunar mansions Shi, Jing, and Di, if one undertakes activities, it will be harmonious and one will obtain peace and security.
On the days of the lunar mansions Qi, Fang, Liu, and Kui, if one travels far, it will be peaceful and auspicious.
On the days of the lunar mansions Zhang, Ji, and Wei, if one wishes to undertake activities, one will obtain the power of good companions.
The six constellations of Jiao, NÃ¼, Zui, Zhen, Pi, and Niu are suitable for forming good friendships and taking a wife.
The ten days of the Shi constellation are governed by a nature that is quick. If one falls ill on this day, use various flowers to make offerings to the spirits. One will recover in thirty days.

Those born on this day are deceitful, become thieves, are foolish and lie, kill living beings, always think evil thoughts, and are not afraid of their parents. If they encounter disputes, battles, or robbery, they will unjustly suffer misfortune. The person must enter the womb in the Di constellation.
If one undertakes work, the days of the Ji, Wei, and Zhang constellations are unobstructed and suitable for all activities.
The three constellations of Pi, Zhen, and Niu, if one undertakes work on these days, everything will be bad.
On the day of the Jing constellation, undertaking work is auspicious.
For those who undertake work on the days of the Fang, Liu, and Kui constellations, there will be many obstacles and no benefits.
On the days of the ghost, tail, and beak asterisms, it is suitable to undertake activities and will bring benefits.
On the days of the lou, seven stars, heart asterisms, and so forth, traveling far will be safe.
On the days of the pleiades, dipper, and winnowing basket asterisms, if one undertakes activities, one will obtain the power of good companions.
On the days of the void, mouth, and horn asterisms, it is suitable to make small acquaintances through agreements.
On the days of the void, asterism, and ascending asterism, it is suitable to make great acquaintances through agreements.
The beak asterism governs for eleven days. If one falls ill on that day, offer flowers and deer jerky to the fire god for seven days to be cured.

One born on that day is wise and delights in the Dharma of sages. They study various arts and can do all kinds of things. They also understand singing, dancing, and entertainment. They are also destined to be very wealthy with much gold, silver, and grain and silk. If one enters the womb, it is suitable on the tail asterism day.
The two asterisms of the pleiades and dipper, on these two asterism days, undertaking various activities is neither good nor bad.
The three constellations of Gui, NÃ¼, and Gui are days for accomplishing tasks.

The three constellations of Xin, Lou, and Qi Xing are days when tasks have many obstacles.ğŸ”½The two constellations of Liu and Fang, on these days if one wishes to do things, they will be accomplished as desired.
On the days of the constellations Zhen, Niu, and Pi, if one does things, they will be as one wishes and one will encounter good companions.
On the days of the constellations Zhang, Wei, and Ji, one's comings and goings will be safe and secure.
On the days of the constellations Kang, Xu, and Can, it is suitable to make small acquaintances.
On the days of the constellations Jing, Di, and Wei, it is suitable to make close friends, which will bring great good fortune.
The twelfth day of the constellation Kui is used for affairs. If one falls ill on this day, they should offer incense and flowers to the gods and spirits. After twenty days, they will recover.

Those born on this day will do soft things and have great power, be respected by people, only need to protect themselves in the dark, be very wealthy with unlimited gold, silver, grain, silk, and so on, and gain other people's things by making profitable business deals.
The days when that person enters the womb are suitable for the constellations of Xin, Zhen, Pi, and Niu, and they also accumulate much.
The two constellations of Kang and Xu, on these two days, the work is neutral, neither good nor bad.
On the day of the constellation of Can, it is not suitable to do work.
The four constellations of Liu, Yi, Dou, and Mao, on these days, going and coming are safe.
On the days of the constellations of NÃ¼, Pi, and Ju, if one does work, one will find good companions.
On the days of the constellations of Ji, Zhang, and Wei, if one wishes to do work, there will be no obstacles and one will obtain manpower.
The three constellations of Lou, Xin, and Wei, on these three days, if one wishes to make friends, it will be beneficial.
The three constellations of Jing, Di, and Wei are suitable for making small acquaintances.
The three constellations of Gui, Wei, and Shi are suitable for making great acquaintances.
The thirteenth day is ruled by the Lou constellation. If one falls ill on this day, offer barley gruel to the deity and one will recover after twenty-five days.

Those born on this day are impetuous by nature, always protect sentient beings, and do not harm life. If they reach a checkpoint, they must be on guard. They should become physicians who are skilled in prescriptions and medicines and can cure various illnesses, and they should also be good at singing and dancing.
If one enters the womb on the day of the heart constellation, there will be no obstacles.
The seven constellations of Jiao, Zui, Nu, Xu, Jing, Kang, and Wei, if one undertakes activities on these days, it will be neither good nor bad.
On these star days, one should not engage in buying and selling, it is not suitable for traveling or shaving, and one should not go to places where there is fighting.

The three constellations of Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, Má¹›gaÅ›ira, and Ä€rdrÄ are suitable for days when one wishes to take revenge or fight, and one will be victorious. It is suitable for doing light and beneficial things and they will be accomplished.

The three constellations of Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä, Má¹›gaÅ›ira, and Ä€rdrÄ are suitable for days when one wishes to travel far and be safe.

The stomach lunar station governs on the fourteenth day. The good and bad events created by people, the good and evil deeds, and illnesses are explained above.
The moon travels through the sky, completes the lunar stations, and starts again at the Pleiades. Therefore, it is called a day.
The sky is full of the moon for thirty days and nights, and it is also called a full moon.
When the eighth month is full, it starts at the stomach and ends at the Pleiades. The month is like this.
Fifteen hours are night and fifteen hours are day. At noon, the shadow is six feet long.
The lunar station Lu moves at night, and Fang is in front of the sun. Mars is the son of the sun. At this time, it follows the sun.
In the eighth month, the scorpion deity is the ruler, and the Pleiades are the occupation, as explained before.
In the bright month, on the fifteenth day, the Pleiades are in use again. The moon joins the Pleiades, and it is the full eighth month. The Pleiades join the moon for a day and night;
after that, they move again and join the lunar station Bi. On the first day of the ninth month, Bi is in use.

In the ninth month, the Sagittarius deity is in charge.

In the dark month of the eleventh month, the moon is in the lunar mansion Ling on the first day, in the lunar mansion Qi Xing on the second day, in the lunar mansion Zhang on the third day, in the lunar mansion Yi on the fourth day, in the lunar mansion Zhen on the fifth day, in the lunar mansion Jiao on the sixth day, in the lunar mansion Kang on the seventh day, in the lunar mansion Di on the eighth day, in the lunar mansion Fang on the ninth day, in the lunar mansion Xin on the tenth day, in the lunar mansion Wei on the eleventh day, in the lunar mansion Ji on the twelfth day, in the lunar mansion Dou on the thirteenth day, in the lunar mansion Niu on the fourteenth day, and in the lunar mansion NÃ¼ on the fifteenth day, which is the full moon of the dark month.

In the eleventh month, when the seven stars are full, there are twelve periods of daytime and eighteen periods of nighttime. At noon, the shadow is twelve footprints long. Gui is the night-walking [constellation], Wei is in front of the sun, moving close to the south, and Chenxing is in charge.
This is the eleventh month, and the water vessel deity rules this month.

In the twelfth month, the dark moon: the first day it joins Zhang, the second day it joins Yi, the third day it joins Zhen, the fourth day it joins Jiao, the fifth day it joins Kang, the sixth day it joins Di, the seventh day it joins Fang, the eighth day it joins Xin, the ninth day it joins Wei, the tenth day it joins Ji, the eleventh day it joins Dou, the twelfth day it joins Niu, the thirteenth day it joins NÃ¼, the fourteenth day it joins Xu, and the fifteenth day it joins Wei, completing the dark month.

In the twelfth month, it joins the Wing asterism, with thirteen periods of daytime and seventeen periods of nighttime, the sun moving closer to the north, the noon shadow twelve footprints, the Seven Stars moving through the sky, and the heavenly teacher Jupiter in charge. This is the twelfth month, with the heavenly fish deity in charge of the month.

The first day of the black month is in Chenshi, the second day is in Jiao, the third day is in Kang, the fourth day is in Di, the fifth day is in Fang, the sixth day is in Xinxing, the seventh day is in Wei, the eighth day is in Ji, the ninth day is in Dou, the tenth day is in Niu, the eleventh day is in NÃ¼, the twelfth day is in Xu, the thirteenth day is in Wei, the fourteenth day is in Shi, and the fifteenth day is in Pi. The first day of the dark month is a conjunction with Pleiades, the second day is a conjunction with Turtle, the third day is a conjunction with Ophiuchus, the fourth day is a conjunction with Crater, the fifth day is a conjunction with BoÃ¶tes, the sixth day is a conjunction with Virgo, the seventh day is a conjunction with Libra, the eighth day is a conjunction with Scorpius, the ninth day is a conjunction with Sagittarius, the tenth day is a conjunction with Capricorn, the eleventh day is a conjunction with Aquarius, the twelfth day is a conjunction with Pisces, the thirteenth day is a conjunction with Aries, the fourteenth day is a conjunction with Taurus, and the fifteenth day is a conjunction with Gemini, which is the full dark moon.

The fourth month joins with the house of Ji, during the day it moves for seventeen periods, and at night it moves for thirteen periods. The first day of the dark month is in Dou, the second day is in Niu and Nu, the third day is in Xu, the fourth day is in Wei, the fifth day is in Shi, the sixth day is in Pi, the seventh day is in Kui, the eighth day is in Lou, the ninth day is in Wei, the tenth day is in Mao, the eleventh day is in Pi, the twelfth day is in Zi, the thirteenth day is in Shen, the fourteenth day is in Jing, and the fifteenth day is in Gui. In the black month of the sixth month, on the first day it is in conjunction with Void, on the second day it is in conjunction with Crater, on the third day it is in conjunction with House, on the fourth day it is in conjunction with Room, on the fifth day it is in conjunction with Outstretched Feet, on the sixth day it is in conjunction with Pleiades, on the seventh day it is in conjunction with Stomach, on the eighth day it is in conjunction with Nebula, on the ninth day it is in conjunction with Net, on the tenth day it is in conjunction with Turtle, on the eleventh day it is in conjunction with Well, on the twelfth day it is in conjunction with Ghost, on the thirteenth day it is in conjunction with Willow, and on the fourteenth day it is in conjunction with Seven Stars. In this way, the sun, moon, years, seasons, and the larger and smaller stars are arranged.
What are the six seasons?

The first and second months are the warm and sunny season, the third and fourth months are the planting season, the fifth and sixth months are the season for seeking rain, the seventh and eighth months are the season when crops are about to ripen, the ninth and tenth months are the cold and freezing season, and the eleventh and twelfth months are the season of heavy snow. These twelve months are divided into six seasons.
There are eight large stars, namely Jupiter, Mars, Saturn, Venus, Mercury, the sun, the moon, and RÄhu.
There are twenty-eight small stars, namely from the Pleiades to the stomach stars.
I have arranged them in this order and explained their principles. You all should see and hear them.
What do you all think?
Is what I have established a fact or not?
Do you rejoice in the activities of the twenty-eight lunar mansions and the eight great stars?
Whether it is so or not, you should each proclaim it.
